title: Can the Xbox One play original Xbox games? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some do yes, buts it’s entirely down to whether the Xbox one is able to perfectly emulate that game. If you click on this link Xbox One Backward Compatibility List | Xbox it will tell you every single Xbox original and Xbox 360 game that is playable on the Xbox One. Just as a side note, even the compatible games on this list are not guaranteed to work 100% as you remember, there is still a chance that a game might be a bit buggy but still playable, for instance some of the cut scenes may struggle for decent audio, but where possible microsoft and the developers have done their best to give you as seamless as possible gameplay
Yes. The compatibility with the Xbox one doesn’t just stop at Xbox 360 games you can also play certain Xbox original games
